channel.title: Jad
channel.description: anyone know in a delta server how to make it so if you dc or log at jad he will either like die or disappear cuz atm if people log or dc at jad if someone logs in they die because jad alive in fight caves. rep++ if you can help other words..... jad minigame is causing death on login because people DC or x log at jad and when they do it glitches the server causing people to die when they login.

item.title: Jad
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“ramsv94, post:1, topic:260817”]anyone know in a delta server how to make it so if you dc or log at jad he will either like die or disappear cuz atm if people log or dc at jad if someone logs in they die because jad alive in fight caves. rep++ if you can help
other words… jad minigame is causing death on login because people DC or x log at jad and when they do it glitches the server causing people to die when they login.[/quote]Don’t use delta. I’ve never encountered a problem such as yours.

Read full topic
